channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Dick's Sporting Goods is latest retailer to forecast rocky 2025 as recession fears swirl
item.description: Dick's Sporting Goods issued weak guidance for 2025 as consumers contend with tariffs, persistent inflation and fears around a potential recession.

item.title: Rheinmetall sales surge 36% in 2024, as company forecasts 'major' military order boom
item.description: Last year's sales boom helped push Rheinmetall's operating profit to a record high.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trumpâ€™s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: L'Oreal CEO plays down the impact of U.S. tariffs, says he's 'not overly concerned'
item.description: L'Oreal CEO Nicolas Hieronimus said he is "not overly concerned" over the impact of White House tariffs on the company.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Kohl's shares plunge 20% as retailer gives rough outlook for the year ahead
item.description: Kohl's posted a beat on revenue for the fourth quarter on Tuesday, but issued disappointing guidance for the year ahead.

item.title: Porsche CEO says Volkswagen ties 'should play a role' amid U.S. tariff threat
item.description: Porsche is part of Volkswagen Group, which has an assembly plant and other facilities in the U.S.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
